unnormalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch? Scholarship portals are your new best friend! These EdTech platforms are seriously booming, especially now during festival season when everyone's budgeting for Diwali sweets and travel back home to Patna.
normalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch? Scholarship portals are your new best friend! These E d T e c h platforms are seriously booming, especially now during festival season when everyone's budgeting for D-I-W-A-L-I sweets and travel back home to P-A-T-N-A.

unnormalised: Think of them as online treasure chests overflowing with opportunities. Forget endlessly scrolling through government websites – platforms like Vidyadhan and Buddy4Study are curating scholarships for everything from engineering at IIT Delhi to arts degrees at JNU.
normalised: Think of them as online treasure chests overflowing with opportunities. Forget endlessly scrolling through government websites – platforms like Vidyadhan and Buddy four Study are curating scholarships for everything from engineering at I I T D-e-l-h-i to arts degrees at J N U.

unnormalised: Many even offer personalized recommendations based on your academic performance and socio-economic background. Imagine securing a scholarship that covers your entire tuition fee, letting you focus on acing those exams and finally perfecting your biryani recipe!
normalised: Many even offer personalized recommendations based on your academic performance and socio-economic background. Imagine securing a scholarship that covers your entire tuition fee, letting you focus on acing those exams and finally perfecting your biryani recipe!

unnormalised: Some portals even offer mentorship programs, connecting you with professionals in your field. So, ditch the stress of funding your education; let these portals be your guide to a brighter, less financially burdened future. It's easier than finding a good auto rickshaw in Bangalore during rush hour, trust us! Don't miss out, applications are open, and remember – Onam Sadhya tastes better when you're debt-free!
